alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 5:43AM CDT until June 18 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tipton County in west Tennessee... Fayette County in west Tennessee... Western Hardeman County in west Tennessee... Southern Haywood County in west Tennessee... Eastern Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 543 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Munford to near Eads to near Collierville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Collierville, Bolivar, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Whiteville, Somerville, Hillville, Lagrange, Eads, Dancyville, Cloverport, Tipton, Warren, Macon, Atoka, Oakland, Mason, Piperton and Gallaway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
